name: Multi Theft Auto (ARM64)
author: savagetheunicorn@users.noreply.github.com
description: Multi Theft Auto: San Andreas is a multiplayer modification for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. This egg is specifically designed for ARM64 architecture.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# MTA:SA ARM64 Installation Script

set -e

apt update
apt install -y wget unzip tar ca-certificates

cd /mnt/server

echo "========================================"
echo "  MTA:SA ARM64 Server Installation"
echo "========================================"

# Download MTA Server
echo "Downloading MTA:SA Server ${MTA_VERSION}..."
wget -q --show-progress https://linux.multitheftauto.com/dl/multitheftauto_linux_arm64.tar.gz

# Extract server files
echo "Extracting server files..."
tar -xzf multitheftauto_linux_arm64.tar.gz
mv multitheftauto_linux_arm64/* .
rm -rf multitheftauto_linux_arm64 multitheftauto_linux_arm64.tar.gz

# Download base config if not exists
if [ ! -f "mods/deathmatch/mtaserver.conf" ]; then
    echo "Downloading base configuration..."
    wget -q --show-progress https://linux.multitheftauto.com/dl/baseconfig.tar.gz
    tar -xzf baseconfig.tar.gz -C mods/deathmatch/
    rm baseconfig.tar.gz
fi

# Download resources if enabled and not exists
if [ "${DOWNLOAD_RESOURCES}" == "true" ] && [ ! -d "mods/deathmatch/resources" ]; then
    echo "Downloading MTA:SA resources..."
    wget -q --show-progress https://mirror-cdn.multitheftauto.com/mtasa/resources/mtasa-resources-latest.zip
    unzip -q mtasa-resources-latest.zip -d mods/deathmatch/
    rm mtasa-resources-latest.zip
fi

# Make server executable
chmod +x mta-server64

# Create/update config with startup parameters
if [ -f "mods/deathmatch/mtaserver.conf" ]; then
    echo "Configuration file exists. Server is ready!"
else
    echo "Warning: Configuration file not found. Please ensure mtaserver.conf exists."
fi

echo "========================================"
echo "  Installation Complete!"
echo "========================================"
echo "Server Version: ${MTA_VERSION}"
echo "Server executable: mta-server64"
echo ""
